ac: 20, touch 11, flat-footed 19 (+7 armor, +1 Dex, +1 natural, +1 shield)
other_gear: mwk splint mail, mwk light steel shield, +1 scorpion whip, mwk javelin, cloak of resistance +1, 15 gp
feats: Dazzling Display, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (whip), Improved Whip Mastery, Intimidating Prowess, Power Attack, Weapon Focus (whip), Whip Mastery

sections.body: During Combat The gnoll lieutenant demoralizes foes and lashes out with his scorpion whip from a distance.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Gnoll lieutenants use intimidation and the crack of their scorpion whips to push lesser members of the pack into battle and to demoralize their enemies.

name: Gnoll Lieutenant
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Gnolls/Example Gnolls/Gnoll War Leaders/Gnoll Lieutenant
combat_gear: potions of cure light wounds (2), potion of cure moderate wounds, alchemist's fire (3), thunderstones (2)
